properties.description: The David Cargill Centre is open to anyone over the age off 55 at a charge of Â£10 per day which includes transport to and from the centre and a three-course home cooked lunch as well as tea and toast on arrival and a cuppa before you go home. Spaces at the Day Centre must be booked in advance we cannot accept drop-ins as the centre caters for people with a variety of needs so you must contact the Centre Manager to see if there is space suitable for you before attending.
